snippet: Tastings of red wines produced in recent years in the northern Rhone Valley, which might have turned out big and burly, have proved reassuring. Among them, a number of producers' entry-level wines from the sunny, opulent 2009 vintage are marvels of...
abstract: Tastings of red wines produced in recent years in the northern Rhone Valley, which might have turned out big and burly, have proved reassuring. Among them, a number of producers' entry-level wines from the sunny, opulent 2009 vintage are marvels of understated elegance, even at an early stage.

headline.main: Recent Rhône Reds Offer Understated Elegance
